original_text: And you shall rejoice before the Lord your God, you and your sons and your daughters, your male servants and your female servants, and the Levite that is within your towns, since he has no portion or inheritance with you.
korean_text: 너희와 너희의 자녀와 노비와 함께 너희의 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할 것이요 네 성중에 있는 레위인과도 그리할지니 레위인은 너희 중에 분깃이나 기업이 없음이니라

sentences.original_text: And you shall rejoice before the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: you and your sons and your daughters
your male servants and your female servants
and the Levite that is within your towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 성문 안에 있는 레위인

sentences.original_text: since he has no portion or inheritance with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너와 함께 분깃이나 유업이 없음이니라
